title: IPO-bound Hyundai Motor India set to launch Creta EV in Q4, eyes major expansion
description: Hyundai Motor India is preparing for growth with an upcoming IPO and plans to launch the Creta EV by the fourth quarter of this financial year. The company aims to lead in India's EV market with four new models and localize the EV ecosystem.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
